name: Susun Ibadah
description:
Susun Ibadah is a game project from a client request. It's only available in Indonesian language. The game mechanic is like a tower bloxx but the player should arrange it in the correct sequence to get the score. You can always check the guide or Panduan (in Indonesia language) to know the sequence.

Gameplay : Get the highest score by arranging the falling object in the correct sequence.

How to play : Tap the screen to drop the object.
